name: PODIA
address: Floor 2 Unit MPR-0256 Bin ZayedNorth PODIA Cairo Cairo Egypt
description: Launched by Menassat Developments in cooperation with the engineering consultant Pinnacle Egypt, Podia Tower is one of the tallest commercial, administrative and medical towers at Downtown New Capital (Touristic District), occupying a total area of 19,782 meters and encompassing 25 floors, 3 basements and a ground floor.Podia Tower is located directly on the northern axis of Mohammed Bin Zayed, in close proximity to the Central Business District and only a few minutes away from Al Massa Hotel. To the northeast of the tower are the Ministry Quarter, Parliament Building and government agencies & institutions. The tower is also privileged with views of the Green River and the Central Park. From the south, Podia Tower enjoys a full panoramic view of the Embassies neighborhood.

name: Maspero Business Tower Nile Heights
address: Building NH Floor 9th floor Unit NHAD0902 Maspero Business Tower Nile Heights Cairo Cairo Cairo Egypt
description: From remarkable views of Cairo’s dazzling cityscape to renowned commercial experiences, Nile Heights is a momentous business tower that provides a futuristic setting for Cairenes. A place that brings the city’s monumental architecture, vast skyline, Nile River, lush spaces and vibrant sunsets into daily office views. Nile Heights is a symbol of business prosperity in Cairo’s most central address. The 24-storey business tower accommodates a spacious upper garage, a ground-level commercial podium, and 134 fully finished office spaces ranging between 92 sqm to 206 sqm. A wide range of amenities is designed to promise daily inspiration, central convenience and exceptional experiences for your thriving business.

name: Blu Vert
address: Building F29 Floor G Unit F2902 Blu Vert New Administrative Capital New Cairo Cairo Egypt
description: Bleu Vert Compound Project – One of the developments by the Saudi Egyptian Construction Company, spanning an area of 70 acres in the heart of the New Administrative Capital.The project directly overlooks Bin Zayed Axis and is just minutes away from the Opera House, as well as the Financial District and the Ministries District. The development includes 208 villas in various styles (twin houses and townhouses), along with 50 buildings, each consisting of a ground floor and 7 repeated upper floors. These buildings offer residential apartments in various sizes to meet all needs, with all units delivered fully finished.The project features a full range of commercial and recreational services, distinguished by a unique and modern approach tailored to the company's clientele, in addition to the project's competitive pricing.
